pageTitle: Well of Eternity Strategy, Loot, Discussions
textBeforeTable: Mannoroth and Varo'then Queen Azshara Peroth'arn Loot Table Utilizing the powers of nature bestowed upon him by the demigod Cenarius, Malfurion Stormrage focuses the will of the living creatures of Azeroth upon the demonic portal hovering over the Well of Eternity. When Mannoroth reaches 5% remaining health, Malfurion casts a spell to cause the portal to violently implode and pull the demonic legions out of Azeroth. Malfurion Stormrage Elune's Wrath - Tyrande unleases a blast of Arcane energy to destroy any nearby lesser demons. Tyrande Whisperwind - Tyrande unleashes a massive blast of Arcane energy to destroy any nearby lesser demons, then collapses. Gift of Sargeras - Illidan infuses himself and all nearby allies with the fel energies of the demon lord Sargeras, healing for 20% of maximum health every 2 seconds and dealing 30000 Fire damage to nearby enemies every 2 seconds. Illidan Stormrage - Illidan infuses himself with demonic energy to finish the fight. Fel Fire Nova - After a player embeds the Magistrike blade within Mannoroth, the open wound emits a steady pulse of fel fire. Each pulse inflicts 30000 Fire damage
